item.description:
Saturday, October 15, 2011, 10:00 AM

Copley Square 607 Boylston Street, Boston, Ma.

 

Boston Book Festival :: :: :: The third edition of the Boston Book Festival will take place on October 15, 2011 in Copley Square. :: :: :: http://www.bostonbookfest.org/ http://www.bostonbookfest.org/2010_schedule/

 

I will stand out in front of the Public Library near the bronze statues... we will meet at 10:00am and walk over about 10:20 am.... please don't be late as there wont be a way to find us.

I will send out my phone number on Saturday morning to those who RSVP "yes" via email .
item.how_to_find_us: I will stand out in front of the Public Library near the bronze statues
item.name: Boston Book Festival
